text: Gretchen Wilson (born June 26, 1973) is an country music singer. In 2004 she had her first number one album on Billboard's Hot Country Songs music chart. As late 2013 she had a song on Billboard's Country Airplay music chart. ==Career== Wilson got a contract with Epic Records in 2003. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Here for the Party (2004) * All Jacked Up (2005) * One of the Boys (2007) * I Got Your Country Right Here (2010) * Right on Time (2013) * Under the Covers (2013) * Ready to Get Rowdy (2017) ==Related pages== * List of country musicians from Illinois ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Country musicians from Illinois Category:American country singers Category:American guitarists Category:Columbia Records artists
title: Gretchen Wilson
